inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed diagnosis of Hodgkin's disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 10% of malignant cells react with anti-Tac
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tac positivity in infiltrating T cells
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma (NHL) with histopathologic subtypes of Tac-expressing NHL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: indolent NHL Stages II through IV with failed standard therapy and disease requiring treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: aggressive NHL with relapse after standard chemotherapy and refused salvage chemotherapy or bone marrow transplantation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hodgkin's disease with low potential for cure with conventional chemotherapy or radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cutaneous T-cell Lymphoma (CTCL) with all stages of Tac-expressing CTCL except Stage Ia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma (PTCL) with stages I - IV and relapse after first-line chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: symptomatic disease due to malignant involvement of the central nervous system
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: urgent chemotherapy or radiation therapy for management of malignancy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and presented with symptoms of cholecystitis. She was found to have Burkitt's lymphoma in the pericardial fluid.
